dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so get this, right? The weighted average dollar exchange rate in Kazakhstan, it dropped to 494.84 tenge! Like, a 1.49 tenge decrease.

dialogue_turns.text: I saw that! Below five hundred! The dollar, like, actually dropped below 500 tenge, can you even believe it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A

dialogue_turns.text: A huge deal! Economists are saying the tenge is strengthening.
